actionCards.name: Double Move
actionCards.effect: You can use two Basic Moves.

actionCards.name: Combo
actionCards.effect:
You can use a Tier 2 Attack/Special Ability.

You can use a Tier 1 Attack/Special Ability.

Only one of these Abilities can be a damaging Ability.
actionCards.metadata: 1 Tier 2 Attack or Special & 1 Tier 1 Attack or Special

actionCards.name: Hit the Deck
actionCards.effect:
Reaction: Dodge

Requirement: You must NOT be Prone nor Immobilized.

You fall prone and reduce the incoming attack by 200 damage.

actionCards.name: Assisted Attack
actionCards.effect:
Scene:

You designate a creature in the scene. The target is dealt 'x' damage where 'x' equals the number of Heroes attacking the target.

Note: For the purpose of triggering events, none of this damage is considered to be coming from a character.

actionCards.name: Dangerous Opportunity
actionCards.effect:
You can use a Tier 2 Attack Ability.

You gain a Basic Move as part of this attack and you MUST move a least 1m.

Drawback: You cannot benefit from Cover.

actionCards.name: Block Strike
actionCards.effect:
Reaction: Block

Requirement: You are targeted by a Melee Attack.

You reduce the triggering attack to 50% damage and can use a Tier 1 Attack against the triggering creature.

Special: If you have Armor, you gain Total Damage Reduction instead.

actionCards.name: Hunker Down
actionCards.effect:
Reaction: Block

Requirement: You are attacked.

You reduce the triggering attack by 50%.

Special: If you have Armor, you gain Total Damage Reduction instead.

Special: If you are behind cover, the attack misses you.

actionCards.name: Dodge
actionCards.effect:
Reaction: Dodge

Requirement: You must be targeted by a Melee Attack.

The attack misses you.

actionCards.name: Running Dodge
actionCards.effect:
All ranged damage dealt to you on the next enemy turn is reduced by 50%. This does NOT stack with Cover.

Special: If you moved at least 5m on your turn, this card is Free to Play.

Special: If you have Armor, you gain Total Damage Reduction instead.

actionCards.name: Lesser Move
actionCards.effect: You can use a Tier 1 Movement Ability.

actionCards.name: Lesser Attack
actionCards.effect: You can use a Tier 1 Attack Ability.

actionCards.name: Lesser Special
actionCards.effect: You can use a Tier 1 Special Ability.

actionCards.name: Lucky
actionCards.effect:
Reaction: Special

Draw 5 cards and Discard 5 cards. This card is Free to Play.

Cards gain in this manner cannot be used on the same Enemy turn they were drawn on.

actionCards.name: Utility Action
actionCards.effect: You can use 2 Tier 1 Special/Attack/Movement Abilities that do NOT deal damage.
actionCards.metadata: 2 Tier 1 Special or Attack or Movement

actionCards.name: Double Attack
actionCards.effect: You can use 2 Tier 1 Attack Abilities.

actionCards.name: Charge
actionCards.effect:
You can take a Basic Move then use a Tier 1 Attack Ability. You MUST move at leat 1m and you cannot benifit from Cover this turn.

Special: If the Attack Action is a Ranged attack, you can move AFTER the attack.

Special: If the Attack Action is a Melee Attack, use a Tier 2 Attack Ability instead.

actionCards.name: Quick Reload
actionCards.effect:
You discard all Reload cards in your hand. This card is Free to Play.

Special: If you have no Reload cards in your hand, gain 1 Surge Charge instead.

actionCards.name: Surge Charge
actionCards.effect:
You gain 1 Surge Charge.

Special: If you dealt damage this turn, this card is Free to Play.

Special: This is NOT an Action.

actionCards.name: Borrowed Destiny
actionCards.effect:
You can use a Tier 1 Special Ability.

You can pay 1 point of Surge Charge to increase this to a Tier 2 Special Ability.

actionCards.name: Omni Action
actionCards.effect:
You can use any Tier 1 Ability.

Special: If this is the only Action you take on your turn, you can use a Tier 2 Action instead.
actionCards.metadata: 1 Tier 1 Special or Attack or Movement

actionCards.name: Magic Bullet
actionCards.effect:
This card is Free to Play.

Put this card in your Sideboard. While this card is in your sideboard, you can Upgrade the reuslt of any Chance Card, if the Card was a Miss or Partial Hit, it becomes a Hit. If the Chance Card was a Hit, then it becomes a Crit. When you use this effect, remove this card from your Sidebar and into the discard pile.

actionCards.name: Mobile Dodge
actionCards.effect:
Reaction: Dodge

Trigger: Any reason.

You use a Tier 1 Movement Ability and move at least 1m. If the Trigger was an attack, you do not take damage from the attack unless you are still within an AoE.

actionCards.name: Assault
actionCards.effect:
When you draw this card, draw an additional card.

This card does NOT count toward your Hand Size.

You can use a Tier 1 Attack Ability.
-OR-
You can Discard this card to gain Advantage on an attack. You can discard AFTER the attack and gain Advantage retroactively.

actionCards.name: Encumbered
actionCards.effect:
Gain 10 Overhealth.

This card is Free to Play if you are wearing Medium Armor and are Proficient in Medium Armor.

actionCards.name: Greater Move
actionCards.effect: You can use a Tier 2 Movement Ability.

actionCards.name: Greater Attack
actionCards.effect: You can use a Tier 2 Attack Ability.

actionCards.name: Greater Special
actionCards.effect: You can use a Tier 2 Special Ability.

actionCards.name: Quick Attack
actionCards.effect:
You can use a Basic Attack.

This card is Free to Play.
